gen:link.msg:message: `AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration` SHOULD be equal to + `PaymentsDueToTerminationOfTheEmploymentIncludingUnduePayments` - `IndividualMaximumPaymentDueToTerminationOfTheEmployment`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_AmountExceedingMaximumRemuneration return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_PaymentsDueToTerminationOfTheEmploymentIncludingUnduePayments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_PaymentsDueToTerminationOfTheEmploymentIncludingUnduePayments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_IndividualMaximumPaymentDueToTerminationOfTheEmployment')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedPaymentsDueToTerminationEmploymentSeniorOfficialsSpecification_PrtFST102Variables1_IndividualMaximumPaymentDueToTerminationOfTheEmployment return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
